import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useLanguage } from '../context/LanguageContext'; import './Footer.css'; const Footer = () => { const { t } = useLanguage(); const containerVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0 }, visible: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }; const itemVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 20 }, visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0, transition: { duration: 0.5 } } }; return (
{/* Social Media */}

{t('footerSocial')}

 {/* Contact Info */}

{t('footerContact')}

  • +90 (555) 123-4567
  • info@detailinx.com
  • Istanbul, Turkey
{/* Quick Links */}

{t('footerQuickLinks')}

  • {t('home')}
  • {t('services')}
  • {t('works')}
  • {t('contact')}
{/* Newsletter */}

{t('footerNewsletter')}

{t('footerNewsletterText')}
); }; export default Footer;
